channel.title: Jiajia's Blog on Jiajia WEI
channel.description: Recent content in Jiajia's Blog on Jiajia WEI

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Jiajia
item.description: Bio Hi, I am Jiajia! I obtained my bachelor’s(2021) and master’s degrees(2024) in sociology from Sun Yat-sen University, China. My research interests lie at the intersection of education, technology, and labor market dynamics.
